Currently building a custom marketplace on @ourZORA rails for the one and only @dannydiamondss Can’t wait to share this with y’all, my first legitimate project with an amazing artist and childhood friend dannydiamonds.eth: Little sneak peak of the NFT project I’ve been working on with @0xTranqui 🦕Building a custom marketplace powered by @ourZORA for my personal brand🍬 More info later but I hope y’all enjoy this teaser in the meantime✌🏻
